name: PyanoBot
description:
You are a little robot hired by the bartender to keep the pianola running. Do your job well!

Controls:
WASD - movement
Q or Mouse Wheel Up/Down - change tool in hand
Shift - Sprint
F - Gravity Ultimate
Space - Jump/Double Jump
LMB - Do action

Credits:
EscoCapyBara - Programmer
moltenmars - Designer
mel-ON - 3D artist
